overview.scope: Automated testing of https://google.com/maps's core functionality and user experience
objectives: Verify accuracy and reliability of location search functionality
Ensure proper functionality of map navigation and interaction features
Validate directions and route planning capabilities
Test saved locations and user preference persistence
Verify map rendering and performance across different devices
Ensure real-time location data accuracy and updates
Validate cross-browser compatibility and responsive design

test_cases.title: Basic Location Search Functionality
test_cases.description: Verify that users can search for a specific location and view results
steps: Press Enter or click search button
test_cases.expected_results: Search results should display with Empire State Building centered on map and info card in side panel

test_cases.title: Map Zoom Controls
test_cases.description: Verify zoom in/out functionality works correctly
test_cases.prerequisites: Website loaded with default map view
steps: Click '+' button to zoom in 3 times
Click '-' button to zoom out 3 times
Use mouse wheel to zoom in and out
Use pinch gesture on touch devices
test_cases.expected_results: Map should zoom smoothly with each interaction, maintaining center point

test_cases.title: Route Planning Between Two Points
test_cases.description: Verify ability to get directions between two locations
test_cases.expected_results: Multiple route options should display with estimated time and distance

test_cases.title: Save Current Location
test_cases.description: Verify ability to save and retrieve locations
test_cases.prerequisites: User logged in with Google account
test_cases.expected_results: Location should appear in saved places list

test_cases.title: Map Loading Performance
test_cases.description: Verify map tiles load efficiently during navigation
test_cases.expected_results: Map tiles should load within 2 seconds with no visible gaps

test_cases.title: Mobile Interface Adaptation
test_cases.description: Verify website adapts correctly to mobile screen
steps: Navigate to https://google.com/maps on mobile device
test_cases.expected_results: Interface should be properly scaled and touch-responsive

test_cases.title: Invalid Location Search
test_cases.description: Verify appropriate error handling for invalid searches
test_cases.expected_results: Should display appropriate 'Location not found' message
